column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I love this place!!! It's very very popular
column2: so if you want a table
column3: you need a reservation (otherwise bar seating works out eventually!). The grilled squid and the bacon-wrapped dates are my absolute favorites. The portions are pretty good for the price. I love bringing friends and dates here
column4: this place is good either way. Highly recommend.
